name: MuStar Kids Lip Sync Tik Game
name_original: MuStar Kids Lip Sync Tik Game
description:
World #1 lip sync clips game - make clips and earn stars!

Create amazing musical videos with MuStar! Choose favourite song out of millions and lip sync it on your phone camera. Feel free to use your imagination and app's special effects to gain subscribers and become famous!

It is a great way to attract attention of millions Instagram and Facebook users to your profile. Obviously number of your fans has a positive effect on your popularity!

Our advantages:
- Unique lips sync clips game mechanics developed by MuStar Team.
- A huge database of songs and movie excerpts that are available in the search!
- No need to register - create your own masterpiece in 1 click!
- Cool video effects are added constantly
- Share videos with friends in the Instagram, Snapchat, WhatsApp, Facebook and other social networks!
- Add #MuStar in your post and get new likes and subscribers from Mustar!

We work very hard on the app development so cool new features and contests are coming very soon!

Follow us:
instagram.com/MuStarApp
facebook.com/MuStarApp
vk.com/MuStarApp

You can manage your subscription settings and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase.
